alert.note: Alert for Fresno (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 5:08PM PDT until March 11 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fresno County in central California... * Until 445 PM PST. * At 408 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kerman, or 16 miles southwest of Fresno, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fresno, Kerman, Raisin City, Easton and Caruthers. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
